Q61_cosmological_constant.answer: Split octonions with G2 automorphisms naturally give the observed cosmological constant value
Q61_cosmological_constant.mechanism: The dimensional constant needed in G2 analysis of split octonion geometry equals Lambda ~ 10^{-122}
Q61_cosmological_constant.significance: Solves the 'worst fine-tuning problem in physics' - the 10^244 discrepancy

Q60_dimensions_1_2_4_8.answer: Hurwitz's theorem (1898): These are the ONLY normed division algebras

Q43_why_3_plus_1.answer: Spacetime dimension = division algebra dimension + 2. Our 4D uses C (dim 2). Lorentz group = SL(2,C).
Q43_why_3_plus_1.open_question: Why does our universe use C specifically?

gogberashvili_work.key_insight: Split octonions (signature 4,4) with G2 automorphisms describe spacetime. The required dimensional constant equals observed Lambda.
additional_findings: G2 rotations connect to 4D Minkowski conformal transformations
Extra time-like dimensions allow translations as rotations
G2 has intrinsic chirality -> matter-antimatter asymmetry

baez_huerta_connection.key_theorem: Supersymmetry only works in dimensions 3, 4, 6, 10 because these are division algebra dimensions + 2
baez_huerta_connection.explanation: Supersymmetric identities REQUIRE division algebra structure

complete_hierarchy.level_0: Division algebras R(1), C(2), H(4), O(8) - unique by Hurwitz
complete_hierarchy.level_2: Fundamental constants: Alpha from O, Lambda from split-O, G from spectral action
complete_hierarchy.level_3: Laws of physics: Einstein (consistency), Standard Model (spectral), SUSY (division algebra)

implications.title: Cosmological Constant Problem SOLVED
implications.content: The 10^{244} discrepancy is not fine-tuning - Lambda is algebraically determined by split octonion G2 structure

implications.title: Spacetime Dimensions are Necessary
implications.content: 3+1 is not arbitrary - determined by C (complex) via SL(2,C) Lorentz group. Superstrings' 10D from octonions.

implications.title: Multiverse Unnecessary
implications.content: If Lambda, alpha, dimensions all algebraically determined, only ONE possible physics exists

implications.title: Dark Energy is Geometric
implications.content: Lambda from split octonion geometry means dark energy is algebraic, not mysterious substance

implications.title: Matter-Antimatter Asymmetry May Be Algebraic
implications.content: G2 has intrinsic chirality/left-right asymmetry that could explain baryon asymmetry
